title: About Soul Calm
description: For more than 20 years, people in Australia have placed their trust in Soul Calm as a reliable source of mental health information, support, and hope.
description1: We are one of Australia's most well-known, trusted, and visited mental health organisations. We never take this for granted. With it comes a deep responsibility to listen, to understand people's needs and aspirations, and to ensure they are at the heart of everything we do.
description2: We are a big blue door for many in the community: a safe and reliable place for millions of people to access information, advice and support â€“ whether they're well and want to stay that way, unsettled or struggling and need support, or in recovery and want to reconnect.
